body:
Hello,

I have a project which aims to be a Paraview pugin. I have created a spack recipe for it and a spack environment to build it. Now I want to generate modules associated to this env. I use for that _spack module tcl refresh_ and it works fine.

However, as my project is a paraview plugin, I need to "inform" my paraview installation that this plugin is available by setting the **$PV_PLUGIN_PATH** variable. Ideally, when I load my project module, I want this variable automatically set.

I try to find a way to indicate in the spack recipe of my project that during the module generation, it have to set this variable. I have read the spack doc all the day, and I have not find something which do that. My question is : 

Is it a way to do that or not yet ?

Thanks for reading =)
Eloise
title: Setting additionnal PATHS in the module generation
